omopColumns.name: NhsNumber
omopColumns.query:
select 
	distinct
		Record ->> '$..NHSNumber..@extension' ->> 0 as NhsNumber,
  		Record ->> '$..PersonDeathDate' ->> 0 as DeathDate
from omop_staging.cosd_staging_81
where DeathDate is not null

omopColumns.name: death_date

dataSource.name: DeathDate
dataSource.description: The date on which a PERSON died or is officially deemed to have died.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	distinct
		Record ->> '$..NHSNumber..@extension' ->> 0 as NhsNumber,
  		Record ->> '$..PersonDeathDate' ->> 0 as DeathDate
from omop_staging.cosd_staging_81
where DeathDate is not null

omopColumns.name: death_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR Administration record

omopColumns.name: cause_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32510`. EHR record patient status Deceased
